name: Juicy!
description:
Tap, Hold & release at the right moment to fill glasses with juice.
Reach new high-score to unlock new amazing glasses.

Visit new parties with different fruit juices. Keep the party going and Juicy vibe by pouring the juice into glasses.

Can you create the most amazing party with Juice? It is up to you and your skill.

Juicy! Simple to play but hard to master.
